pages.title: Stack
pages.text: Multiblock (top->bottom): blast_funnel, blast_funnel, blast_funnel, blast_furnace. Set any firebox below the blast_furnaceâ€”electric, standard, or oil. Heat only; no motor required.

pages.title: Mixing Tips
pages.text: Input on the powered/fuel side; outputs on the opposite face. Use funnels to batch alloy inputs, then pipe results onward. Pairs well with the thermal furnace upstream.

pages.name: Alloy Furnace Stack
pages.text: Top-down: blast funnels x3, alloy furnace at zero, firebox beneath. Visualize to place the full stack. Any firebox variant works; the preview uses the electric firebox.
